recent_events.title: J.J.P. Dehigama Memorial Orienteering Challenge 2025
recent_events.description: Honoring the spirit of adventure and precision, the J.J.P. Dehigama Memorial Orienteering Challenge 2025 marked a thrilling day of navigation, teamwork, and determination. Scouts from across the island showcased their skills and sportsmanship in this memorable annual event.

recent_events.title: Championship at Sqdn.Ldr.Manoj Weerakotuwa Memorial Challenge Trophy 2024
recent_events.description: Congratulations! üèÜ‚öúÔ∏è We proudly inform you that Kingswood College Scout Group emerged the Championship at Sqn.Ldr.Manoj Weerakotuwa Memorial Challenge Trophy 2024, which was organized by the 5th Kandy Vidyartha Scout Group Kandy. recent_events.title: 10th National Scout Jamboree 2024
recent_events.description: Kingswood Scouts gathered in front of their ingenious campsite entrance, fashioned after a buzzing beehive. Their teamwork and creativity are the nectar that sweetens the 10th National Scout Jamboree 2024 experience in Trincomalee, Sri Lanka.

recent_events.title: 110 Years of Kingswood Scouting
recent_events.description: Celebrating legacy. We honor the enduring legacy of Kingswood Scouts, a tradition built on courage, dedication, and the values that shape future leaders in every way.
